trs: hei saw that hej was eating himself’ (vio que estaba comiendo en sí mismo) (agr040720_22)\footnote{The final verb is nominalized and functioning as a finite verb, a frequent construction in traditional narratives (cf. Section sec:overall:2.1). The auxiliary verb ‘live’ in the bracketed clause is marked for switch-reference indicating that its subject is coreferent with the object of the final verb (see \citealt{Overall2017}, Section sec:overall:13.6).}
